skill_tests.title: Python Programming Fundamentals Test
skill_tests.description: Comprehensive test covering Python basics, data structures, and object-oriented programming concepts
skill_tests.instructions: This test contains 15 questions covering Python fundamentals. You have 60 minutes to complete. Read each question carefully and select the best answer.

skill_tests.title: Data Structures and Algorithms Assessment
skill_tests.description: Advanced test on data structures, algorithms, and problem-solving techniques
skill_tests.instructions: This assessment tests your understanding of fundamental data structures and algorithms. Focus on time and space complexity analysis.

skill_tests.title: Java Programming Skills Test
skill_tests.description: Evaluate your Java programming skills including OOP concepts, collections, and best practices
skill_tests.instructions: This test covers Java fundamentals, object-oriented programming, and advanced concepts. Pay attention to code syntax and logic.

skill_tests.title: Database Management Systems Test
skill_tests.description: Comprehensive assessment of SQL, database design, and optimization techniques
skill_tests.instructions: This test evaluates your knowledge of relational databases, SQL queries, and database design principles.

skill_tests.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
skill_tests.description: Test your understanding of machine learning algorithms, concepts, and applications
skill_tests.instructions: This assessment covers supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and basic neural networks. Focus on conceptual understanding.

skill_tests.title: Arrays and Strings Skill Test - Basic
skill_tests.description: Short assessment on arrays and string fundamentals.
skill_tests.instructions: 20 minutes. Quick MCQs and one short coding question.

skill_tests.title: Arrays and Strings Skill Test - Advanced
skill_tests.description: In-depth problems on arrays, rotations and string algorithms.
skill_tests.instructions: 60 minutes. Includes coding and MCQs.

skill_tests.title: Linked Lists Skill Test - Basic
skill_tests.description: Basic linked list concepts and operations.
skill_tests.instructions: 30 minutes. MCQs and one implementation coding question.

skill_tests.title: Linked Lists Skill Test - Advanced
skill_tests.description: Advanced pointer manipulation and list algorithms.
skill_tests.instructions: 70 minutes. Multiple coding problems and MCQs.

skill_tests.title: Trees and Graphs Skill Test - Basic
skill_tests.description: Fundamentals of trees and basic graph traversals.
skill_tests.instructions: 40 minutes. MCQs and one coding traversal problem.

skill_tests.title: Trees and Graphs Skill Test - Advanced
skill_tests.description: Complex tree/graph problems including shortest paths and tree transformations.
skill_tests.instructions: 90 minutes. Several coding and theory questions.

skill_tests.title: Python Basics Skill Test - Basic
skill_tests.description: Core Python syntax and small exercises.
skill_tests.instructions: 25 minutes. MCQs and a short coding question.

skill_tests.title: Python Basics Skill Test - Advanced
skill_tests.description: Deeper Python problems including advanced constructs.
skill_tests.instructions: 50 minutes. Several coding and MCQ questions.

skill_tests.title: Data Structures in Python - Skill Test Basic
skill_tests.description: Lists, tuples, dictionaries and basic manipulations.
skill_tests.instructions: 30 minutes. MCQs and one coding question.

skill_tests.title: Data Structures in Python - Skill Test Advanced
skill_tests.description: Advanced data structure tasks and optimizations in Python.
skill_tests.instructions: 60 minutes. Multiple coding tasks and MCQs.

skill_tests.title: OOP Concepts Skill Test - Basic
skill_tests.description: Classes, objects and basic OOP questions.
skill_tests.instructions: 30 minutes. MCQs and one short coding task.

skill_tests.title: OOP Concepts Skill Test - Advanced
skill_tests.description: Design patterns, inheritance and polymorphism problems.
skill_tests.instructions: 65 minutes. Coding and design questions.

skill_tests.title: HTML & CSS Skill Test - Basic
skill_tests.description: Markup and styling fundamentals.
skill_tests.instructions: 25 minutes. MCQs and short practical tasks.

skill_tests.title: HTML & CSS Skill Test - Advanced
skill_tests.description: Responsive design and advanced CSS techniques.
skill_tests.instructions: 50 minutes. Practical and MCQ questions.

skill_tests.title: JavaScript Fundamentals - Skill Test Basic
skill_tests.description: Core JS concepts and DOM basics.
skill_tests.instructions: 30 minutes. MCQs and short coding exercises.

skill_tests.title: JavaScript Fundamentals - Skill Test Advanced
skill_tests.description: Asynchronous JS, closures and advanced DOM manipulation.
skill_tests.instructions: 60 minutes. Coding challenges and MCQs.

skill_tests.title: Frontend Frameworks Skill Test - Basic
skill_tests.description: Fundamentals of modern frontend frameworks (component basics).
skill_tests.instructions: 35 minutes. MCQs and small implementation tasks.

skill_tests.title: Frontend Frameworks Skill Test - Advanced
skill_tests.description: State management, routing and performance optimizations.
skill_tests.instructions: 75 minutes. Multiple coding and MCQ questions.
